name: rsi_overbought
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool barpatterns.
Tool description: Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
API description: Fetches a list of stocks that have the RSI (Relative Strength Index) Overbought signal using the BarPatterns RapidAPI.

page.description: The page number to retrieve (default is 1).
